titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to restore the duty rate that prevailed under the Tariff Schedules of the United States for certain twine, cordage, ropes, and cables.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/2/1995--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to set the duty rate for certain twine, cordage, ropes, and cable.
